sentences.en: a four-letter word he had used off camera.
sentences.cn: 他那句没被摄下来的脏话。

sentences.en: He is sparkling and versatile in front of the camera.
sentences.cn: 镜头前的他光彩照人，多才多艺。

sentences.en: He pounced on the photographer, beat him up and smashed his camera.
sentences.cn: 他突然扑向摄影师，痛打了他一顿，还摔碎了他的照相机。

sentences.en: Her grandmother lent her a camera for a school trip to Venice and Egypt.
sentences.cn: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

sentences.en: His face will be discreetly concealed by camera angles.
sentences.cn: 通过调整照相机的角度，他的脸将被巧妙地遮住。

sentences.en: I should not leave my briefcase and camera bag unguarded.
sentences.cn: 我不该把我的公文包和相机包留在那儿无人看管。

sentences.en: judges assess the merits of such claims in camera.
sentences.cn: 法官们私下里对这些要求的法律依据进行评估。

sentences.en: Rare birds preen themselves right in front of your camera.
sentences.cn: 很少有鸟类会在镜头面前梳理自己的羽毛。

sentences.en: Saivonsac shot the entire film with a hand-held camera.
sentences.cn: 塞冯萨克使用便携式摄像机拍摄了整部影片。

sentences.en: Sylvia, camera in hand, asked, "Where do we go first?"
sentences.cn: 西尔维娅手里拿着相机问道：“我们先去哪里？”

sentences.en: The camera combines rugged reliability with unequalled optical performance and speed.
sentences.cn: 这款相机既坚固耐用，又有超凡的光学性能和快门速度。

sentences.en: The camera has undergone only two minor tweaks since its introduction.
sentences.cn: 那款相机自从推出以来仅经过两次小的改进。

sentences.en: There was a Leica camera for sale in the window.
sentences.cn: 橱窗里有架莱卡相机待售。

sentences.en: Tourists were scrambling over the rocks looking for the perfect camera angle.
sentences.cn: 游客们在正爬上岩石寻找最佳的拍摄角度。

sentences.en: Use a small aperture and position the camera carefully.
sentences.cn: 用小光圈，仔细调整相机位置。

sentences.en: Use a weatherproof rucksack to carry your camera and lenses around in.
sentences.cn: 用防风雨的帆布背包装照相机和镜头。

sentences.en: With trembling fingers, he removed the camera from his pocket.
sentences.cn: 他手指哆嗦着从口袋里取出相机.

sentences.en: You can move the camera both vertically and horizontally.
sentences.cn: 你可以上下左右移动摄像机。
